title: 新武器咋装啊？
author: yyy
txt_content: 有了新武器，可不知道装，乱装装烂了，谁帮帮我啊！

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
新武器? 是 Balkon's WeaponMod 嗎? 問問題最好還是說清楚些... 
請看內附的說明文件 Readme.txt , 不懂英文者, 請自行利用翻譯工具... 
- Backup your minecraft.jar
- Requires Risugami's ModLoader, so first install those.
- Copy all the files in the "Files for mods folder" folder, to the .minecraft/mods/ folder.
        This includes the zip with the class files and the properties file.
- Delete META-INF if you did not do that already.
- (Optional) Install the HD textures to put them in your texture pack in the right folders or replace them with the standard ones in the WeaponMod.zip.
- Enjoy!

備份你的minecraft.jar, 以防萬一
先安裝ModLoader(詳細下載及安裝方法, 參見MOD置頂帖)
把武器MOD內的"Files for mods folder"文件夾中的東西, 全丟進遊戲目錄 .minecraft/mods/ 裡頭
(沒有 mods 文件夾者請自己新增, 另外, 別自己多事把人家的壓縮文件解壓...  )
刪除 minecraft.jar 裡的 META-INF 文件夾(如果有的話)
想用高清材質的話, 再把"HD textures (optional)"文件夾中的東西, 放到你的材質包中, 或是WeaponMod.zip裡
就這樣...
